item.title: About
item.description: Punk Domains allows you to register a domain name attached to your account address. Why would anyone need that? Well, your crypto address is hard to remember. It starts with 0x, but then continues with 40 random characters (digits from 0 to 9 and letters from a to f). If you want someone to send you tokens, sure you could send them your address and they could copy-paste it into their wallet.
